dialogue.speaker: felix
dialogue.dialogue_line: and from the look of you...

dialogue.speaker: felix
dialogue.dialogue_line: you seem to be lost in more ways than one...

dialogue.speaker: felix
dialogue.dialogue_line: the forest path may help you yet, but it is not without its dangers

dialogue.speaker: felix
dialogue.dialogue_line: you might want to go talk to zahir, the first shrine keeper, he might be able to protect you better than I
